summary: I Modified SweetFX 1.5.1 to improve the dulled lighting and Colouring caused by using Climates Of Tamriel 3.1.
descriptionHtml:
COT is a great mod, but I found that it gave my colors and textures a washed out look. I have tweaked this Config to deliver a vanilla enhanced look, as well as enhance color saturation a bit. Sweet FX also has a positive effect on the definition of textures.

PLEASE NOTE: In-Game Effect is more pronounced, my screen shots don't do justice (I'm looking at you, afterburner)

-FXAA and SMAA are enabled, so I recommend disabling in game AA.
-Recommend turning in game brightness down to minimum.

Download Sweet FX 1.5.1 Here : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23364/
Copy to your main skyrim folder and replace with my settings
author: Gfunk839
